_description: Template for configuring bidirectional synchronization between a specific TeraBox folder and Notion workspace

terabox._description: TeraBox configuration - restricted to specific folder only
_notes: targetFolder: The specific folder to sync - will be created if it doesn't exist
folderId: Will be populated automatically after initialization
watchSubfolders: Whether to sync subfolders within the target folder
pollingInterval: How often to check for changes (in milliseconds)

notion._description: Notion configuration - restricted to specific workspace only
_notes: token: Notion integration token from notion.so/my-integrations
workspaceId: The specific workspace ID to restrict operations to
databaseId: Will be populated automatically after database creation
restrictToWorkspace: Ensure operations only affect the specified workspace
pollingInterval: How often to check for changes (in milliseconds)
mode: 'bidirectional', 'terabox_to_notion', or 'notion_to_terabox'
conflictResolution: Strategy for resolving conflicts
autoRetry: Whether to automatically retry failed operations
maxRetries: Maximum number of retry attempts
retryDelay: Delay between retries (in milliseconds)
batchSize: Number of operations to process in a batch
enabled: Whether to perform OCR analysis on supported file types
baseURL: URL of your DeepSeek OCR instance
apiKey: API key for OCR service (if required)
languages: Languages to detect and analyze
extractFinancialData: Whether to extract financial information from documents
level: 'debug', 'info', 'warn', or 'error'
file: Log file path (null for console only)
maxFiles: Maximum number of log files to keep
maxSize: Maximum size of each log file
healthCheckInterval: How often to perform health checks (in milliseconds)
metricsRetention: How many days to retain metrics data
alerts: Configuration for notifications and alerts
maxConcurrentOperations: Maximum number of sync operations to run concurrently
operationTimeout: Timeout for individual operations (in milliseconds)
connectionTimeout: Timeout for API connections (in milliseconds)
cacheSize: Maximum number of items to keep in memory cache
compressionEnabled: Whether to compress file transfers
encryptStoredCredentials: Encrypt credentials stored in configuration
validateSSLCertificates: Validate SSL certificates for HTTPS connections
rateLimitEnabled: Enable rate limiting for API requests
maxRequestsPerMinute: Maximum API requests per minute
ipWhitelist: List of allowed IP addresses (empty = allow all)
realTimeSync: Use webhooks for real-time synchronization
smartConflictResolution: AI-powered conflict resolution
autoFileClassification: Automatic file classification using ML
predictiveSync: Predictive synchronization based on usage patterns
